short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that adds a download button to the Twitch clip page, allowing for one click download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a twitch styled button to clips pages, that allows for you to simply click it to download a clip.
